name: Camp Moth
description:
Welcome to Camp Moth! Here you’ll meet five fuzzy friends who are sure to make you feel fuzzy inside - Motthew, Cocoonsey, Anteena, Mirimoth and… erm... Moth Steve!

They have been spending their summer time-Moth at a fun beachside camp getting to know each other, telling scary stories and learning about the laws of ther-moth-dynamics around the roaring campfire. However, everything must come to an end and sadly camp moth is no different.

There is only one night of camp remaining, so Help your new best friends to pull an all-nighter by keeping their fire going until the morning. Set out in search of materials, dry sea-soaked items out by the fire and keep the flames stoked so that they can stay out all night. You never know, you might just hear a bit more about what they’ve been up to!

We hope you have a great time at camp moth, and remember kids to have your moth-er waiting to pick you up at 9:00am sharp tomorrow!

Credits:

Character Design - Lina Kalcheva & Steve Lawson

Art - Steve Lawson

Story - Matt Lawson, Lina Kalcheva, Steve Lawson, Meirian Davies & Casey BL

Programming - Meirian Davies & Casey BL
